channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 13:41 Driven the alarm to the Donetsk region.Crete on further messages.
item.description: 🟢 13:41 Driven the alarm to the Donetsk region.Crete on further messages.#Donetsk This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
